name: Isekai Introduction
description:
Life is good. You've finally saved enough money that you can become a full time NEET(Not in Education, Employment or Training) and can spend all of your time at home doing what you love. Playing games. Little did you know that this would be the death of you. The gods watched it happen, take pity on you and have decided to reincarnate you into a new world as an adventurer. This is it, now you don't get to play your games anymore, you can LIVE them. Now go into the world and write your own adventure!

Arrow keys for movement

"Z" to interact

"Shift" to open inventory

Be sure to wonder and interact with everything you can

gb studio defaults — https://www.gbstudio.dev

gameboy rpg — https://sondanielson.itch.io/gameboy-simple-rpg-tileset

gb_assets — https://materialfuture.itch.io/gameboy-assets

gbs-merry-sample-project — https://github.com/chrismaltby/gbs-merry-sample-project

gurbs adventure — https://petermilko.itch.io/gurbs-adventure

murder mansion — https://jan-schneider.itch.io/murder-mansion

sprites — https://rekkimaru.itch.io/gb-studio-sprites-16x16

untitled-gb-game-master — https://github.com/chrismaltby/untitled-gb-game/tree/master/assets
